title: Not getting Key fragments and Honor Flair.
body:
Since a while ago, I noticed whenever I am honored after a game, I never get the honor flair on the loading screen on the next one (I almost never play premades so I should be getting a flair even with one honor). 

I also remember getting a Key Fragment almost everyday. Now I haven't gotten one in weeks? Just wondering if anyone has the same problem or if something is wrong with my account.

replies.body: You're at least honour level 3? If you're still H2 you won't get flairs. As for key fragments, in the old system the drop rate would slowly lower before resetting each month (from when you first earned your key, not from a particular date), I believe there is something similar in the new system.
